bill.title: Mortgages; Foreclosure; Mediation
bill.description: Requires foreclosing lenders to notify their mortgagors about credit counseling no later than thirty days prior to foreclosure; if promissory note and mortgage document are requested, then foreclosure is prohibited until these documents are provided. Effective September 14, 2047. (SD2)

Oshiro, Souki, Wakai, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, Luke, Mizuno, Tsuji.
